A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Spoiler free reaction: Incredible theatrical experience! If you were the type that complained The Force Awakens was too similar to A New Hope\, Rian Johnson has delivered for you in a big way. A fresh story breaking new ground in the Star Wars saga. Nothing in this 2 hour and 30 minute epic is predictable. Can't wait to see where we go in the next chapter. Five stars!
